alert.note: Alert for McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 14 at 8:45PM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON CST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 degrees. For the Winter Weather Advisory, light freezing rain is expected. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 5 above zero. * WHERE...McMullen. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 3 AM CST Monday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to noon CST Monday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 3 AM to noon CST Monday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from late Monday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
